trans-unit.source: Contains basic functionality for creating a user in a step that can be templated.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder grunnleggende funksjonalitet for oppretting av en bruker i et trinn som kan være organisasjonsapper.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen kan ikke arves.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control creates new user accounts in a Web site's user data store.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>kontrollen oppretter nye brukerkontoer i et webområde bruker datalageret.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>

trans-unit.source: The CreateUserWizardStep is, by default, the first step within the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: CreateUserWizardStep er, som standard er det første trinnet i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>

trans-unit.source: The CreateUserWizardStep step is a required step within the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: CreateUserWizardStep-trinn kreves i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>

trans-unit.source: The CreateUserWizardStep class is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatedWizardStep> class.
trans-unit.target: Klassen CreateUserWizardStep er avledet fra <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatedWizardStep>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatedWizardStep>

trans-unit.source: The CreateUserWizardStep is displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompleteWizardStep> step.
trans-unit.target: CreateUserWizardStep vises i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>kontrollerer før den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompleteWizardStep>trinn.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompleteWizardStep> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Although the CreateUserWizardStep step is the first step in the wizard by default, it is possible to provide a different first step.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Men CreateUserWizardStep trinn er det første trinnet i veiviseren som standard, det er mulig å angi et annet første trinn.

trans-unit.source: Doing so, however, can affect whether the **Previous** button is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Gjøre dette er tilfellet, kan imidlertid påvirke om den **forrige** knappen vises.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the CreateUserWizardStep step does not have a custom navigation template, and is preceded by another step that is rendered before CreateUserWizardStep, then the **Previous** button is displayed on the CreateUserWizardStep step at run time.
trans-unit.target: Hvis CreateUserWizardStep trinn ikke har en egendefinert navigasjon-mal, og begynner med en annen trinn som gjengis før CreateUserWizardStep, for eksempel vil **forrige** knappen vises på CreateUserWizardStep trinn ved kjøretid.

trans-unit.source: If the CreateUserWizardStep step is rendered before the alternate "first" step, then the **Previous** button is not displayed.
trans-unit.target: Hvis CreateUserWizardStep trinn gjengis før det alternative "første" trinnet vil **forrige** vises ikke knappen.

trans-unit.source: Furthermore, the **Previous** button is never rendered at design time.
trans-unit.target: I tillegg av **forrige** knappen gjengis aldri under utformingen.

trans-unit.source: If you want the **Previous** button to be rendered at design time, you must add it to the custom navigation template of the CreateUserWizardStep step.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil bruke den **forrige** for å gjengis ved utformingen, må du legge den til egendefinert navigasjonsmalen av CreateUserWizardStep trinnet.

trans-unit.source: You can modify the CreateUserWizardStep step to contain additional fields, or change the display order of the fields included in the CreateUserWizardStep step, by editing the template associated with the control.
trans-unit.target: Du kan endre CreateUserWizardStep trinn for å inneholde flere felt, eller du kan endre visningsrekkefølgen for feltene i CreateUserWizardStep-trinnet ved å redigere malen tilknyttet kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The new Web site user account is created in the data store when the user clicks the **Next** button on the CreateUserWizardStep step.
trans-unit.target: Den nye webområde brukerkontoen er opprettet i datalageret når brukeren klikker den **neste** -knappen på CreateUserWizardStep trinn.

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizardStep.AllowReturn%2A> property is set to `false` to keep the user from returning to the CreateUserWizardStep step and accidentally attempting to create another user account with the same credentials.
trans-unit.target: Som standard i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizardStep.AllowReturn%2A>er satt til `false` hindre at brukeren gå tilbake til CreateUserWizardStep trinn og ved et uhell forsøk på å opprette en annen brukerkonto med legitimasjonen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizardStep.AllowReturn%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizardStep.AllowReturn%2A> property to `true`, you must include logic in your application to remove the user account that was originally created before the user returned to this step, or to allow the user to edit information he or she originally entered.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du angir den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizardStep.AllowReturn%2A>egenskapen `true`, må inneholde logic programmet til å fjerne brukerkontoen som opprinnelig ble opprettet før brukeren tilbake til dette trinnet, eller Tillat brukeren å redigere informasjon om han eller hun opprinnelig ble angitt.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizardStep.AllowReturn%2A>

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizardStep"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizardStep"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the user is allowed to return to the current step from a subsequent step in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om brukeren kan gå tilbake til gjeldende trinn fra et etterfølgende trinn i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The AllowReturn property is set to `false` to keep users from returning to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizardStep> step and accidentally trying to create another user account with the same credentials.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen AllowReturn er satt til `false` hindre at brukere gå tilbake til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizardStep>trinn og ved et uhell prøver å opprette en annen brukerkonto med legitimasjonen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizardStep>

trans-unit.source: If you override the AllowReturn property and set it to `true`, you should include logic in your application to remove the user account that was originally created before the user returned to this step, or to allow the user to edit information he or she originally entered.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du overstyrer egenskapen AllowReturn og sett den til `true`, bør du ta logic i programmet til å fjerne brukerkontoen som opprinnelig ble opprettet før brukeren tilbake til dette trinnet, eller Tillat brukeren å redigere informasjon om han eller hun opprinnelig ble angitt.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user is allowed to return to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizardStep"></xref> step; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis brukeren tillatelse til å gå tilbake til den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizardStep"> </xref> trinn; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to set the property.
trans-unit.target: Forsøkte å angi egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of user interface (UI) to display for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizardStep"></xref> step of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir typen brukergrensesnittet (UI) skal vises for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizardStep"> </xref> trinn i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The StepType property specifies the navigation options to display for the user-account-creation step of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen StepType angir alternativer for navigering skal vises for kontoen Brukeroppretting trinn i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>

trans-unit.source: The StepType property determines which of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control's navigation buttons are displayed on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizardStep> control.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen StepType bestemmer hvilke av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>kontrollens navigasjonsknappene vises på den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizardStep>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizardStep> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase.StepType%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase.StepType%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase.StepType%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > If you attempt to change the StepType property to any value other than the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType> value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType> enumeration, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > Hvis du prøver å endre egenskapen StepType til en annen verdi enn den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType>verdien for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType>opplisting en <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>vil bli utløst.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType>

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kan ikke angis ved oppsett eller stil arket Oppsett.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>og [ASP.NET tema og skallene](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType"></xref> enumeration value of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType"> </xref> opplistingsverdien for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType"> </xref> opplisting.

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to set the StepType property to a value other than the <xref uid="langword_csharp_WizardStepType.Auto" name="WizardStepType.Auto" href=""></xref> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: Forsøk på å angi egenskapen StepType til en annen verdi enn den <xref uid="langword_csharp_WizardStepType.Auto" name="WizardStepType.Auto" href=""> </xref> listeverdi.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the title to use for the user-account-creation step of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir tittelen skal brukes for kontoen Brukeroppretting trinn i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen Hvis du velger, kan lagres automatisk på en ressursfil ved hjelp av en designer verktøyet.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>og [globalisering og lokalisering](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The title to use for the user-account-creation step of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Tittelen skal brukes for kontoen Brukeroppretting trinn i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The default value is "Sign up for your new account."
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er "Registrer deg for den nye kontoen."

trans-unit.source: The default text for the control is localized based on the server's current locale.
trans-unit.target: Standardteksten for kontrollen er lokalisert basert på gjeldende nasjonale innstillinger for serveren.
